reviews.Review: I recently visited the Mall of Georgia and was extremely impressed. The mall was very clean and spacious, and had a great selection of stores and restaurants. Parking was a breeze, with plenty of parking close to the front entrance. Navigation within the mall was easy, thanks to the signs pointing to the largest stores. All in all, it's a great mall and I would highly recommend it!
The small has every store you can think of. And some stores are doubled. Great food court. Really nice playground for children.

There is too much to do at this mall. You can spend an entire day here and still not make it to all the stores. Very kid friendly. Very clean and very spacious. Wasn't hard to navigate at all. Great experience.

Eight family members met for lunch and a little shopping. We had lunch at PF Changs and it was very good and the service was excellent. Our waitress was very attentive and friendly. Plenty of free parking available. Handicapped parking and entrance available.
Beautiful mall with a lot of different stores, shops, restaurants, activities etc. it was beautiful inside and out. Loved seeing a huge variety of people.
Great selections of stores, clean facility, great playground and food court. But I can only give 4 star caz there‚Äôs no lego store.
Busy as usual. Movies Under the Stars tonight was fun. Happy we didn't get rained out.

"Mall of Georgia truly lives up to its name! It offers a unique shopping experience with an amazing in-store Regal movie theatre and a spectacular food court. A must-visit destination for all shopping enthusiasts!"
Enjoyed a nice outing with my sister and nephews on Black Friday 2022. It was very busy but we were able to find a great parking spot and scored lots of bargains. It was a very fun experience.

The mall has it all ‚Äì from delicious food to cool entertainment options, and even places to grab a drink of water when you're thirsty. There are hardly any empty shops, and the Regal theater there looks really amazing! I suggest checking it out for some great shopping fun!

Grant and Tyler are amazing! They were very patient with me during my car buying process. Grant explained everything in detail and Tyler did great with the numbers. I‚Äôm very pleased with the service I got today.

I recently visited the Mall of Georgia and had a delightful shopping experience. Here's why I highly recommend this mall:

**Cleanliness:** The Mall of Georgia is exceptionally clean, which makes for a comfortable shopping environment. The well-maintained facilities and spotless corridors add to the overall positive experience.

**Ample Parking:** One of the standout features of this mall is the abundance of parking spaces. Finding a convenient parking spot was a breeze, eliminating the usual hassle of circling the lot endlessly.

**Comfortable Crowds:** Unlike some other malls that can feel overwhelmingly crowded, the Mall of Georgia strikes a great balance. It was bustling but not overly packed, allowing me to shop and explore without feeling claustrophobic.

Overall, the Mall of Georgia offers a clean and spacious shopping environment with ample parking, making it an excellent choice for a day of retail therapy. Whether you're looking for fashion, dining, or entertainment, this mall has it all. I had a wonderful time and will certainly be returning for my future shopping needs.

We had a great time shopping and hanging out with the kids.  Of few of our favorites in the mall were Billy Beez, kids play area & train ride, Barnes & noble(outside portion). They are already setting up for Christmas pictures with Santa.  The area looks cute and I believe is priced at about $35.

Love the mall.  We did game stop,  the one by target is way better with more trade in games.  We went to Stoneage I love their crystals. Stopped in Dillard's for some makeup.  The cologne smell was super strong. A little much. Went to Brighton and got some sun glasses. Dropped off mine for new lenses. Had lunch at pf changs too.
UPDATE 9-10-2023. We had a great shopping experience again today.  I have to say they have the worst bathrooms.  Half the toilets don't work, they're filthy dirty.  Half of the saints work you're lucky if you can find soap.  Just hurry up and quickly dry your hands on your clothes and get out.

I love this mall.. it's clean big and has a ton of nice stores! There are plenty of food options outside and inside. I can say this mall is so nice that it stays crowded! The weekends are the worst.. it's not just like that for the holidays.. it's just a nice crowded mall.. I ran into 2 social media stars there.. the backpack kid and the McClure twins... so you'd be surprised of who you see there.. there is also this outside lawn area near the food court.. it's so relaxing and beautiful..to just relax.. plus, when they do the outdoor movies, it's nice. I recommend it.

I've grown up in this area and can remember the location before the mall was built, but I love this mall and the businesses that function within it. It has constantly been growing since it's established date! Gwinnett as a whole has been one of the largest growing counties within the country for the past 23 years! I hope it county continues to keep up with it's growth

Mall of Georgia Review

Not what I expected! It was my first time going to this Mall only because it‚Äôs out of my way but since I was in the area at my MINI Cooper car dealership, I decided to finally check it out. I‚Äôm pleasantly surprised! This is a nice Mall. It has great light, airy with a robust food court and good selection of restaurant chains some are the usual mall restaurants like Cheesecake Factory and PF Chang‚Äôs but there are also a few not so usual options like Tin Lizzy‚Äôs Cantina and a BBQ joint.

There‚Äôs indoor/outdoor playground for kids if you have kids and you‚Äôre into that. All the stores you need and more! A movie theater but I didn‚Äôt check that out.

Live music was playing in the courtyard on a Saturday afternoon. It‚Äôs the weekend so it was quite busy. If you‚Äôre into shopping centers, Mall of Georgia is worth checking out.
This is a great place to hang out with Great place to get your shoes Regal bring them up to your stand

This mall definitely deserves its name! It has so many stores, restaurants and amenities. We bring our children here all of the time to enjoy the indoor playground as well as the outdoor splash pad. We love eating in the food court and enjoy coming to the theater to watch movies here. There's plenty of free parking and it's a safe and quiet place to shop.
Very bright and lovely atmosphere!!! Has some unique shops and other types of fun for all ages!!

Lots of restaurants in the area to choose from if you want more than a snack. Something for everyone in the store. I went to Macys and purchased a couple of items. Love this mall.

There are plenty of stores, great costumer service. Lots of restaurants and options to eat. Tomorrow is Thanksgiving and it wasn't as packed as I expected, the only long line I had to wait was in Bath & Body Works otherwise, the stores weren't that bad. There are no covid restrictions anymore there is no peron limit allowed in the store so no lines outside the store. Hope you guys have a great experience here as I did! There were christmas decorations, lookt pretty.
I visited this mall with my family, they had such a great time, the kids had the opportunity to play while my wife went shopping, definitely we're gonna come back to this mall!
Lot of stores, things, food and stuff to explore.

This mall I was expecting more from... But it was an ok Stop.... Has plenty of regular stores that are at all malls.... They do have an airsoft shooting range.. which was pretty pretty ok.... They also have an Imax theater that is really outdated.... The mall was clean... Not many people shopped there... So we didnt have to worry about crowds or lines... The food court had a lot of varieties of food to choose from... Even sushi... But many of the places the food looked like it set out too long and wasnt fresh.. the mall is pretty big..... Very big and nice mall. Came here for shopping most of the time and didn‚Äôt have the chance to check out the food court though.

What a great mall. However, why isn't there a store directory near mall entrances? Having never been here, I had to practically walk the whole mall to find a certain store. No overhead signs over the hallways where the restrooms are. Felt lost the whole time.

This mall is HUGE nice clean good atmosphere, an amazing range of shops from budget to high end, kids carousel (with paid kid $2.50 or 5 for $11, free adult to ride with them) food court plus real restaurants.  Plenty of large clean bathrooms.  Stores from clothes, to kids stuff, to jewelry, to electronics, to kind of in site car dealership sales.

I always have a great time shopping at the Mall of Georgia. This time I was with my daughter.  We got great service at Dillards and Von Maur and enjoyed a delicious Starbucks while walking around. We get lots of steps in too!
Alcohol option would bring this place to 5 star. Still awesome to see 12mm IMAX
Mall of Georgia was very crowded.  Stores were running a lot sales. The food court  selection of fast food is fine

Always have a reasonably positive experience here. My gf and I visit it often to see the new things stores here have out. The food court has good options and the Asian food places are the best!! The Barnes and noble has massive book selections so make sure if you enjoy to read to stop in there before going into the actual mall! Twice now when the mall closed and we went to leave there was a live concert in the lawn outside! Shopping here and leaving at close has offered 2 great experiences. And the movies in the theater are very high quality!

This mall is family-friendly and has a nice variety of stores and restaurants. The soft play on the first floor is my kids‚Äô favorite but the outdoor play area is a close second. They also like the carousel in the food court and the pet store upstairs. I like the unique stores like the one where everything is handmade in Mexico. It‚Äôs a good mall to visit when we want to have a pleasant indoor experience (like when the pollen is terrible, lol).

This mall is huge. The layout outside of the mall is similar to that of an outlet but the inside of the mall is three floors. You have your basic mall stores that you would find in local mall and few different stores sprinkled in. It‚Äôs nothing spectacular to see at this mall. The food court is terrible. If the mall is going to be that huge it would be nice to have something better than basic mall options. I actually chose Chinese because the options were so limited or the line was too long and I almost threw up. I spat my food out too see what I was chewing and it looked like shredded plastic. I hate the parking has changed and Simon malls have became greedy. It‚Äôs still seasonal mall.

The Mall of Georgia is beautiful, clean, and it has everything that you can possibly think and more. With a large variety of makeup, shoes, electronics, games, toys, cell phones, and clothing stores you can shop until you drop and empty your wallet. The mall has repair shops, jewelry, carpet, arcades, movie theater, and restaurants to enjoy a meal & dessert. There's something for everybody and if you can't find it, they will order it and ship it. They are open 7 days a week Monday through Saturday from 10am till 9pm and Sundays from 12pm tilln7pm. Enjoy it and have fun!

I came here from out of town and they have everything inside this mall we were able to hit a couple stores to get what we needed and shop around and we ate at two different places in the food court that were awesome. The mall was also super clean and the tables at the food court were well kept and sanitary.

This is a nice place. All the stores are filled and a good selection of places to eat, There's a outside courtyard area where they have live music. When I was there the emergency responders or the county were holding a recruiting event which was pretty cool to see all the equipment on display and talking to the firefighters, police.
Super big and have most of famous brand names. Fit to everyone for a whole day. Food court is huge with many good choices
